divs: Sighting DetailsWas driving about 8:30 pm on 241 toll road souhbound between irvine blvd and portola pkwy. Going off ramp to pay toll looked out my drivers window at 60 degrees and noticed what I thought was helicopter very red and looked as if it was on fire bottom was flames red color on top. I then thought it was a hot air balloon.. but it was flying to fast. The bottom definitly had flames eminating from it. It moved in southeast to northwest direction for about one to two miles. I stopped my truck and starred right at it as it hovered over the road about 500-1000 feet above. It was not a helicopter or plane or balloon. I am 53 yrs old and have a masters degree and have never seen anything like this....ever. I went to get my camera phone and video it but by the time I got it I looked up and just as I was to aim at it it VANISHED. No sght of it again. It disappeared. It as though was watching me and my actions and new I was going to photograph it and vanished. I then dialed 911 and reported it. Of course what was I reporting ? A ufo not an emergency but no one seemed concerned or had any sense of urgency. I also contacted channel 4 nbc but again nothing. Also I reported it to irvine pd. But nothing as well. I have never seen anything like this and I am positive it was not manmade. It was definitely a ufo and definitlety not an aircraft or meteor or asteroid or comet. Feel free to call me. I SAW IT ..IT WAS REAL and WAS A UFO...
